info.description: Retrieves exchange rate for currency or currency pair
info.title: API to retrieve exchange rate for currency or currency pair

get.summary: Retrieves the live market rate from  rate feeds
get.description: Retrieves the live market rate from a given rate feed and displays the rate provider for a given currency

parameters.name: currencyId
parameters.description: Identifier of the currency. This is the 3-letter ISO 4217 code of the currency.

parameters.name: rateSource
parameters.description: The market rates source in general. In the case of currency rate, whether rate is to be sourced from  currency table (front office) or from market rates table (back office).

parameters.name: rateProvider
parameters.description: The market rate provider, e.g. Bloomberg, Reuters, etc.

parameters.name: assetType
parameters.description: Type of the asset, e.g. FX, equity, etc.

parameters.name: dateOrPeriod
parameters.description: Refers to a date or a given period.

parameters.name: rateIndicator
parameters.description: Market rate indicator as per the asset class. For currency, it  will be buy rate(B) , sell rate(S) or mid rate(M).

parameters.name: interpolationMethod
parameters.description: Identifies whether forward exchange rates are to be interpolated or not. Possible values are 'Blank' - Rate will be interpolated '1' - Takes the next available rate '2' - Takes the closest rate

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

parameters.name: credentials
parameters.description: Username and password to authenticate the API against core-banking.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

get.summary: Retrieves the exchange rate(used in revaluation) of a foreign currency with respect to local currency
get.description: Retrieves the exchange rate(market middle rate) of a foreign currency with respect to local currency, which is stored in the system. This middle rate is used in revaluation to revalue the  foreign exchange contracts.
